problem_text:
Problem 4: Do (8)-(10) imply that [s, Ns] = 0
∀s ∈S?
Conjecture: Assumptions (8) and (10) imply
[s, Ns] = 0
∀s ∈S.
(11)
It is pointed out in [4], p. 416, that if (11) holds, then S is a sphere.
A proof of the above Conjecture implies a positive solution to the Pompeiu problem:
see [4], Chapter 11, and [5], [6].
